about_the_game:
About this game

In the 'Journey of Harvest Demo', you will take over Zone 21 as a manager, and on this land, you can:

-Use tools to collect resources.

-Plant some crops.

-Build production equipment for collecting or processing resources.

-Assemble automated production lines to improve production efficiency.

-Explore the mine, resist the attack of underground guards, and collect some special resources.

-Utilize special resources to create useful magical props.

-Combining the prices of resources in the market, reselling various resources to earn the price difference.

Automation

Raw materials are put into the production equipment to make the corresponding items. Based on this principle, assembling an automated production line and waiting for some time can make a lot of needed items. What? Don't want to wait too long? Just sleep in the game and wait for the next day.

Explore

Ancient secrets lie beneath the mines. Upgrade your equipment, hire more adventurers or assemble more robots and venture into the mines to collect rare ores and gems, build fortifications against the endless attacks of the mysterious Underground Guard, and reap the random rewards of each round to buy more time for the miners.

Planting

Zone 21 was contaminated years ago, and while the surface land is not suitable for planting, we can use planters to grow, clear out an area, place planters (no need to place planters on the roof as there are no zombies attacking the area), plant fruits and veggies, water or place an automated watering device, and harvest the crops.

Magical props

In the game, you can create many magical props, which have powerful functions and some props have funny functions.

Market

With the deepening of research, more bizarre products can be developed, and the raw material prices for manufacturing goods will undergo subtle changes with market supply and demand. Choosing the right time, purchasing resources, and manufacturing goods can yield higher profits.

short_description: Your father, who is the district chief, has appointed you as the manager of Zone 21 in the Blackrock Cave and set a small goal for you: earn one hundred million. Try every means possible to earn funds from adventurers and enjoy this journey of reaping rewards.
